title: Indulgences
description: Scarlet now lives in SHOTS and realizes she's not alone. A secret group of cannibalistic villains have been infesting the chaotic town, and they are not to be underestimated.With Shiloh turning into a stranger befor her eyes, Scarlet is left with a torn choice of discovering some answers. . . though it could mean she goes traitor.
author: Weslie Jensen
